code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var CartSlice=createSlice({name:"cart",initialState:[],reducers:{add:function add(state,actions){state.push(actions.payload);},remove:function remove(state,actions){return state.filter(function(item){return item.id!==actions.payload;});}}});var _CartSlice$actions=CartSlice.actions,add=_CartSlice$actions.add,remove=_CartSlice$actions.remove;export{add,remove};export default CartSlice.reducer;
